### 1. Simulating GBM Paths
```{r}
S0 <- 100  # Initial stock price
T <- 1  # time in years
Num_Periods = 11
dt <- T/Num_Periods # time
mu <- 0.05   # Annualized drift
sigma <- 0.25 # Annualized volatility 
Num_Paths = 10000 # Change to 10000 later

X <- matrix(rnorm(n=Num_Paths*Num_Periods, (mu - (sigma^2)/2)*dt, sigma*sqrt(dt)),Num_Paths,Num_Periods)
X <- cbind(rep(0,Num_Paths),t(apply(X,1,cumsum)))
GBM <- S0*exp(X)
Time_Periods = seq(0,T,dt)
write.csv(GBM,'GBM.csv')
```
